description: The Joao Lemos cave in Brazil’s Minas Gerais state has yielded an exciting discovery: fossils of a giant sloth that roamed the Earth during the Ice Age. description: The Central Bank of Egypt (CBE) said that annual headline urban inflation fell for the fourth month in a row, to 29.8% in January 2024, down from 33.7% in December 2023 and from its peak of 38% in September 2023.
